entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
